meanings.definition: Taking care to avoid potential danger or harm.
meanings.sent1: She is the carefullest person I know when it comes to crossing the street.
meanings.sent2: He always wears his helmet when riding his bike, being the carefullest in our group.
meanings.sent3: The carefullest squirrel in the park always double-checks before crossing the road.
meanings.sent4: Her carefullest nature is like a shield that protects her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The carefullest approach to handling fireworks is to follow all safety instructions.

meanings.sent1: The carefullest artist spent hours perfecting every brushstroke on the painting.
meanings.sent2: She is the carefullest student in the class, always checking her work for mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The carefullest chef in the kitchen never misses a single ingredient in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His carefullest eye caught the smallest imperfection in the design.
meanings.sent5: Paying carefullest attention to detail ensures a flawless final product.

meanings.sent1: The carefullest driver on the road always obeys the speed limit.
meanings.sent2: Being the carefullest hiker in the group, she packed extra supplies for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The carefullest decision-maker weighs all options before choosing a path.
meanings.sent4: In life, taking the carefullest steps can lead to the best outcomes.
meanings.sent5: Approaching the situation with the carefullest mindset prevents unnecessary risks.
